title: Taylor Swift Is Off TikTok: Why Universal Music Pulled Its Songs - Bloomber

title: Record Labels Dig Their Own Grave. And the Shovel is Called TikTok.

title: How TikTok Chooses Which Songs Go Viral
excerpt: When Megan Thee Stallion took off her bright orange mask and walked onstage to accept her Grammy on March 14, she fought back tears and thanked God, her mother, and her managers for helping her become the first female rapper to win the award for best new artist in two decades.
